attributes.action: have hospital staff ensure that hospitals are a place of peace in which patients can safely recover, not war zones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Noise, bugged by bugs and confusion ! Please simplify hospitals as places to be ... the readwwrite campaign was a great success, in ensuring hospitals are clearly sign - posted, but you need :

1. Sssshhh ! Babies sleeping signs perhaps ??
2. To actually enforce your anti - bullying policies
3. Address bedside numbers (see www.petitions.pm.gov/bedsidenumbers
4. Address timing of procedures eg. dressings might be better conducted in a separate place 

P.S. I was looking at the hospital map en route to the eye clinic in my local hospital and someone said, "What are ya' lookin' for ?".
